titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit the takeoffs and landings of subsonic aircraft exceeding certain noise limits.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

bill.summary: 10/28/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit the takeoffs and landings of subsonic aircraft exceeding certain noise levels at U.S. airports. States that this prohibition applies only to an airport during the three-year period beginning on the effective date of this Act if the number of individuals residing within five miles of it exceeds 100,000.
